name: Burg_354
culture_notes: Speaks Riveric Dialect with Coastal loanwords
River funerary rites and tide-timed markets
Diet focused on smoked fish and reed-breads
Communal ritual-labor guilds organize key services
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
notes: Tech: near-medieval to early-industrial; limited combustion industry
State governance unknown â€” likely semi-autonomous river precinct
